snippet: Despite questions about its origins and financing, a report by a new shale institute at SUNY-Buffalo is being cited as authoritative evidence that natural gas drilling regulations are working.
abstract: Despite questions about its origins and financing, a report by a new shale institute at SUNY-Buffalo is being cited as authoritative evidence that natural gas drilling regulations are working.

headline.main: Fracking Research and the Money That Flows To It
